amendment.description: Amendment provides a funding level of $97.5 million to FEMA for mass transit security programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide $97,500,000 in funding for Mass Transit Security Programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Swalwell (CA) amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Swalwell (CA) amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Swalwell (CA).
